txt.en:
'Little traveller, will you prove your worth to me? I am Tahvo, leader of this clan. Will you hunt with us?

'Wargs befoul our lands, slavering beasts with long yellow teeth. They roam to and fro as if they own it. It is our land, not theirs.

'Hunt them, and you may earn my respect.'
'Oho! Oho. A feisty little wanderer, this one. Well, you have my attention, little friend. What can the Rauta-lehmä do to please this most intriguing guest?'
'The wretched Wargs are killing off the aurochs and ruining their meat...the beasts must be stopped!'
Elder Tahvo has asked you to prove yourself by defeating many Wargs on his turf.
Warg packs prowl the hills of eastern Nan Amlug, befouling the land of the Rauta-lehmä.\n\nElder Tahvo has asked you to prove your worth by slaying some Wargs.
Elder Tahvo is at Rosfold, east across the mountain range from Esteldín.\n\nYou should tell Elder Tahvo that you have fulfilled his requests, and many Wargs now lie slain by your hand.
